@graph.name: Mangalam Chai
@graph.description: Premium chai café in Jagatpura, Jaipur offering authentic tea, delicious food, and perfect ambiance for relaxation and good conversations.

review.reviewBody: Best chai in Jagatpura! The ambiance is perfect for studying and hanging out with friends.

@graph.name: Best Chai & Café in Jagatpura, Jaipur | Mangalam Chai
@graph.description: Premium chai café in Jagatpura, Jaipur with authentic tea, food, music, and chill vibes. Open 9AM-11:30PM daily.

mainEntity.name: What are the opening hours of Mangalam Chai?

acceptedAnswer.text: Mangalam Chai is open daily from 9:00 AM to 11:30 PM.

mainEntity.name: What types of chai do you serve?

acceptedAnswer.text: We serve various types of chai including normal chai, kullhad chai, masala chai, lemon chai, and black tea, all made fresh with premium ingredients.

mainEntity.name: Do you offer food along with chai?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, we offer a complete menu including Maggi, sandwiches, pasta, chowmein, chaat, patties, and more, all at affordable prices.

mainEntity.name: Is Mangalam Chai suitable for students and working professionals?

acceptedAnswer.text: Absolutely! Our café provides the perfect environment for studying, working, or simply relaxing with good music and comfortable seating.
Mangalam Chai is located in Jagatpura, Jaipur, Rajasthan, India. You can find us easily using Google Maps or contact us for directions.
